page.title: 05FARMING IN FELMINGHAM
page.content: The area is mainly arably farmed; the crops being{wheat}for flour;{barley} noted for its fine quality malt used for the best beer & the famous Scotch whisky;{sugar beet}refined for sugar with the bi-product used for cattle feed;{peas, broad beans & low beans} for deep-freezing and canning; and {potatoes}grown extensively for human consumption. Some farms have herds of 100-plus {dairy cattle. Cattle for rearing and {fattening}are housed intensively. {Poultry,}both laying hens and table birds, including{turkeys}are housed intensively in lots of several hundreds in each building.
